acceptanceCriteria: On the LilyPage, the left edges of the title, description, image, and engagement/action row align consistently (no additional left indentation relative to each other).
The change removes the visible left gap the user referenced without breaking the avatar/metadata display.
Layout remains responsive (mobile and desktop) and does not introduce horizontal overflow or clipped content.
No changes to backend behavior, data fetching, or mutations are required for this UI-only alignment update.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing shadcn components instead).
Do not modify immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep the backend single-actor architecture unchanged; no backend changes are needed for this request.
nonGoals: Redesigning the LilyPage beyond alignment (e.g., changing typography, adding new features, altering engagement functionality).
Changing the mobile header/logo behavior (separate pending request).
